name: channel_videos_playlists
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool youtube_v3_lite.
Tool description: Lite version of Youtube Data API v3. Get Youtube data without any Youtube api key
API description: Retrieve videos or playlists from a YouTube channel using the channel ID.

channelid.description: The ID of the YouTube channel to fetch videos or playlists from.

part.description: The part parameter specifies a comma-separated list of one or more video resource properties that the API response will include.

x_cachebypass.description: Cache bypass parameter. The value must be '1' to bypass the cache.

type.description: The type of resource to fetch. Acceptable values are 'video', 'playlist'.

order.description: The parameter to sort the results. Default is 'date'. Acceptable values are:
